title: Rahul Gandhi wishes Arun Jaitley speedy recovery after Kidney transplant
article_body: NEW DELHI: President on Monday wished a speedy recovery to Finance Minister , who has undergone a surgery at . "I'm happy to hear that Jaitley ji's kidney transplant surgery today at AIIMS went well. I wish him a speedy recovery," Gandhi said in a tweet. The All India Institute Of Medical Science (AIIMS) said that both the recipient and the donor were stable and recovering well.
